title: EP 50: Young, Gifted, and Podcasting
description: From joy to trauma to history, our kids are expressing their Blackness through podcasting. We celebrate Black child podcasts, featuring Jackson and Avery - hosts of the podcast ‘Hey Black Child’, and Story Jean Brown - host of the podcast ‘Story on Stories’. Today, we listen to the kids!
itunes:title: Young, Gifted, and Podcasting
itunes:subtitle: We celebrate some Black podcasters who are starting young
author: hangout@thestoop.org (Hana Baba and Leila Day)
itunes:author: Hana Baba and Leila Day

Today, we listen to the kids!
